name: The Perilous Adventures of Terry the Frog
name_original: The Perilous Adventures of Terry the Frog
description:
Poor Terry is imprisoned inside the horrible and bleak place that is your mind!

Can you guide him through this surreal puzzle game and find a place for him and his lovely wife Cherry?
Try not to murder him too often! You wouldn't like to be forgotten either.

Installation Guide:
Download and unpack the .rar file (or the.zip for anyone who has not yet seen the light) and start the .exe inside.
